author: Neneh Cherry and Andi Oliver
programme: Neneh and Andi Dish It Up
method: Put the beans and thyme into a saucepan of lightly salted water and boil vigorously for about 45 minutes, until the peas are soft. Allow the boiled kettle water to cool a little then pour over the desiccated coconut in a bowl to make coconut water. Put the desiccated coconut and boiled water into a blender or food processor and blend, then strain. Discard the coconut. Add the rice and coconut water to the soft peas in the saucepan.  Put a lid on the saucepan, turn the heat down very low and leave the rice to cook. It will take approximately 40 minutes.
